alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Campbell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:10AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Campbell, southeastern Bedford, and south central Amherst Counties and the City of Lynchburg through 445 AM EDT... At 410 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huddleston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynchburg... Bedford... Altavista... Huddleston... Rustburg... Forest... and Evington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
